title: FD: Driver collided with pole in Weston
title_page: FD: Driver collided with pole in Weston
maintext:
WESTON — There were non-life-threatening injuries involved with a crash in town Friday afternoon, fire officials said.
The fire department and emergency medical services responded to a one-car crash on Steep Hill. One fire engine and four additional fire units were dispatched to the scene of the crash.
Fire officials said the driver collided with a utility pole. The driver had non-life-threatening injuries.
Officials did not say what caused the crash.
